EmailTemplate.description: New Member Request, Message for Channel Partner when Member Request is Rejected
EmailTemplate.name: Contact: Email to Channel Partner when New Member Request is Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: New Member Request Rejected for: {!Partner_Requests__c.First_Name__c} {!Partner_Requests_c.Last_Name_c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your new team member request was rejected. Click here to view the details of your request. (Here = {!Partner_Requests__c.Link}) Please reach out to the Global Channel Partner team if you have any questions. (Global Channel Partner team should be set as mailto: GlobalChannelPartnerOps@illumina.com)
Thank you.
